feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Business One
feed.subtitle: SAP Business One Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Unable to Reconcile USD Payment with USD Invoice If Customer is All Currency
entry.content:
Hello,

We are using SAP Business One with local currency set to EGP (Egyptian Pound).
We have a customer defined as "All Currencies".

Scenario:

- In February, we received an incoming payment in USD from the customer to a USD bank account, using an exchange rate of 60

- In June, we issued a USD invoice to the same customer, but at an exchange rate of 50.

- When trying to clear the invoice using the earlier payment (through Incoming Payments or manual reconciliation), we are facing the following issues

- The Cumulative Balance in FC (USD) is not equal to the Balance Due FC.

- The system only allows clearing in local currency (EGP) — it does not allow us to choose USD as the clearing currency.

- No option appears to settle in the original transaction currency (USD).

Question:

- Is there a way to force or allow clearing in foreign currency (USD) instead of local currency?

- How can we reconcile or match USD payments against USD invoices with different exchange rates?

- Is there a recommended workaround for this scenario 

Any insights would be highly appreciated.

Thanks

entry.title: Endorse check by DI API or Service Layer
entry.content:
Via the service layer or the SDK it is possible to replicate the functionality of Converted = 'Y' when executing an Endorsement from the "Check Register" menu, checking the SDK I found this composition of the OCHH table that mentions said field

I tried to do it through DI API, but I verify that only the value in the check record changes in the payment received

 oPayments = ObSBO.GetBusinessObject(SAPbobsCOM.BoObjectTypes.oIncomingPayments)

 oPayments.Checks.Endorse = SAPbobsCOM.BoYesNoEnum.tYES

entry.title: GL accounts by item level
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Currently I am using default GL account determination by item group which means any transactions that falls under particular group will use the accounts defined in the respected item group.But now I have scenarios like for some item,even it uses different revenue account unlike the revenue account defined in item group.I thought of creating new item group for those items which has different revenue account,but it may lead to defining many item groups which i dont want.I want to set GL account by item level for some item.but I dont know from where to define the gl accounts and which GL accounts must be required to fill up.Can anyone guide me please

entry.title: PO price Change-Approval process
entry.content:
Hello Experts, 

We are set price list to all vendors and mapped that price to vendors in CRM.  Now Purchase order get item price automatically form that list. I want user do not change price if he change then its go for approval. 

 

i right the query but its go for approval every time even price not change. Can you please check query & corrected it. 

SELECT DISTINCT 'True'
FROM OPOR T0
INNER JOIN POR1 T1 ON T0."DocEntry" = T1."DocEntry"
INNER JOIN OCRD T2 ON T0."CardCode" = T2."CardCode"
INNER JOIN ITM1 T3 ON T1."ItemCode" = T3."ItemCode"
AND T3."PriceList" = T2."ListNum"
WHERE T1."Price" <> T3."Price"

Regards, 

GK

entry.title: Error while updating Resource Master Data from DTW
entry.content:
Dear Expert,

We are currently experiencing an issue:
“Error while updating Resource Master Data from DTW.”

notif error : error
‘1880000009 - Future internal, committed, or consumed capacity must all be zero
for thiswarehouseResourcesService'

We have already referred to SAP Note 2690525, but the issue still persists.

Kindly request your assistance to help resolve this.

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: Balance of an item group is not matching in inventory audit report and General Ledger
entry.content:
Hi Community,
Balance of an item group is not matching in inventory audit report and General Ledger, I am seeing both the report for 01/04/2025 - 30/04/2025. Excluded the manual journal entry from general ledger but still there is difference in both the report. The Inventory Audit Report is showing more balance than the General ledger.


Please let me know how to find out the reason behind it.

entry.title: Change log - Differences screen on fixed asset master data
entry.content:
Hi All,
I was hoping you have info on how to interpret the differences window on a fixed asset master data:
This asset was fully depreciated 2 years ago(although still active).. but it shows updates by manager. However manager does not "work" on the fixed assets. So just wanted to know what these entries mean and how to interpret it. 

Thanks all,
Jerusha

entry.title: Sap business One mobile App Attachments
entry.content:
Good morning,
I am experiencing a problem with the sap business one mobile app. In Sap I have created a specific path for each user to split the attachments, but since I have done this, users viewing the attachments on the mobile app can no longer see the attachments on the new path. The error says: FIE019 No file exist for patterns; What can I do to make the app point to the new paths?

entry.title: PR document
entry.content:
Dear Expert,

When creating a PR document, attempting to copy it to PO failed and an error occurred:

1 Internal error (2) occurred [Message 131-183]
2 [Microsoft][ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server][SQL Server]Error converting data type nvarchar to numeric. (ITM12)
3 The rate value in the row should match the document rate. [Message 439-144]

Kindly request your assistance to help resolve this.

entry.title: how create validation for OSPP table -HANA DB
entry.content:
Dear team,

Can you guide how to create validation for Special price  

CNT1:=0;
IF :OBJECT_TYPE='7' AND (:TRANSACTION_TYPE='A' OR  :TRANSACTION_TYPE='U') THEN
 
 
 
select count("CardCode") INTO CNT1 from ospp ---TO_NVARCHAR(CURRENT_TIME, 'HH24:MI')
where ifnull("U_LeadBy",'')=''  and ifnull("ItemCode",'')<>'' and ("ItemCode"||"CardCode")=:list_of_cols_val_tab_del ;
 IF :CNT1>0 THEN
        ERROR := 122;
       ERROR_MESSAGE := 'pls updateU_LeadBy ';
     END IF;
END IF;

entry.title: API Gateway Download PDF - 500 INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR
entry.content:
When trying to render a pdf file using the API Gateway service I get the following error message from the server

{
    "code": 500,
    "message": "500 INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR"
}

The request sent is trying to consume a layout of ObjetType 22 (OPOR)

[
    {
        "name": "ObjectId@",
        "type": "xsd:decimal",
        "value": [
            [
                22
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "name": "docKey@",
        "type": "xsd:decimal",
        "value": [
            [
                23614
            ]
        ]
    }
]

entry.title: SAP Business One Partner in Pune
entry.content:
Why Choose SAP Business One for Your Business?

SAP Business One is an affordable, easy-to-use ERP solution designed specifically for small and medium-sized enterprises. It helps manage your key business functions—including finance, inventory, production, sales, and customer relationships—on a single integrated platform.

Key Benefits:

  • Real-time business insights and reporting
  • Seamless integration across departments
  • Scalable and customizable
  • GST and compliance-ready
  • Cloud and on-premise deployment options

    PTS – Leading SAP Business One Partner in Pune

    As a certified SAP Business One partner in Pune, PTS Systems & Solutions helps SMEs and growing businesses achieve operational excellence. With extensive domain knowledge and local presence, we provide hands-on support from consultation to implementation and post-go-live assistance.

    Industries We Serve with SAP Business One

    We offer SAP Business One solutions customized to your industry’s unique requirements.

    Industries we specialize in:

     

    Manufacturing (Auto, Textile, Engineering, etc.)

     

    Wholesale & Distribution

     

    Retail & E-commerce

     

    Pharmaceuticals & Chemicals

     

    Construction & Real Estate

     

    Food & Beverages

    Our End-to-End SAP Business One Services

    We provide comprehensive ERP services that cover the entire lifecycle of your SAP journey:

     

    SAP B1 Consultation

    We evaluate your business needs and recommend the right solution.

     

    Implementation

    End-to-end deployment using SAP best practices and minimal downtime.

     

    Customization

    Tailor-made configurations to suit your workflows and reporting formats.

     

    Training & Support

    User training, troubleshooting, and ongoing functional and technical support.

    Benefits of Partnering with PTS Systems

    Why SMEs in Pune prefer us:

     

    SAP-certified implementation partner

     

    Proven track record with 250+ successful projects

     

    Local support and fast response time

     

    Post-implementation handholding

     

    Flexible engagement and pricing models

entry.title: Creating sales invoices without accounting impact for a specific customer in SAP Business One
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I'm working on SAP Business One and I'm looking for a solution to create sales invoices for a specific customer without generating any accounting impact (i.e., without creating automatic accounting entries).

SAP Version: SAP Business One version

Modules Used: Sales - AR, Accounting 

Thank you in advance for your help.

Kind regards,

entry.title: SAP B1 - DTW - Purchasing UOM Codes
entry.content:
Hi,
I am trying to import unit measure into DTW and it I am getting this message Default UoM must be defined in "Unit of Measurements" of "Items" first or be cleared after it is deleted in "Unit of Measurements"

I have an UoM Group setup as CASE100, so there are 100 EACHES in 1 case.

I need a Purchasing UoM Code and Purchasing UoM Name to be CASE100 and items per purchase to be 100.

If I did it manually, I would click on the 3 dots next to the Purchasing UoM Code and select CASE100 as the default.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.
ItemCode      DefaultPurchasingUoMEntry      PurchaseUnit
ItemCode      DefaultPurchasingUoMEntry      BuyUnitMsr
20011E          3                                                          3

The 3 is from OUOM for CASE100
